name: Gumi
text: Idan mai aukuwa ta auku.

name: Gumi
text: Bãbu wani (rai) mai ƙaryatãwa ga aukuwarta.

name: Gumi
text: (Ita) mai ƙasƙantãwa ce, mai ɗaukakãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Idan aka girgiza ƙasã girgizwa.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma aka niƙe duwãtsu, niƙẽwa.

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka kasance ƙũra da ake wãtsarwa.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma kun kasance nau'i uku.

name: Gumi
text: Watau mazõwa dãma. Mẽne ne mazõwa dãma?

name: Gumi
text: Da mazõwa hagu. Mẽne ne mazõwa hagu?

name: Gumi
text: Da waɗanda suka tsẽre. Sũ wɗanda suka tsẽren nan,

name: Gumi
text: Waɗancan, sũ ne waɗanda aka kusantar.

name: Gumi
text: A ckin Aljannar ni'ima.

name: Gumi
text: Jama'a ne daga mutãnen farko.

name: Gumi
text: Da kaɗan daga mutãnen ƙarshe.

name: Gumi
text: (Sunã) a kan wasu gadãje sãƙaƙƙuu.

name: Gumi
text: Sunã gincire a kansu, sunã mãsu kallon jũna.

name: Gumi
text: Wasu yara samãri na dindindin gẽwaya a kansu.

name: Gumi
text: Da wasu kõfuna da shantula da hinjãlai daga (giya) mai ɓuɓɓuga.

name: Gumi
text: Bã a sanya musu cĩwon jirĩ sabõda ita, kuma bã su buguwa.

name: Gumi
text: Da wasu 'ya'yan itãcen marmari daga irin waɗanda suke zãɓe.

name: Gumi
text: Da nãman tsuntsãye daga wanda suke ganin sha'awa.

name: Gumi
text: Da wasu mãtã mãsu fararen idanu da girmansu.

name: Gumi
text: Kamar misãlan lu'ulu'u wanda aka ɓõye.

name: Gumi
text: A kan sakamakon, dõmin abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Bã su jin wata yãsassar magana a cikinta, kuma bã su jin sun yi laifi.

name: Gumi
text: Sai dai wata magana (mai dãɗi): Salãmun, Salãmun.

name: Gumi
text: Da mazõwa dãma. Mẽne ne mazõwa dãma?

name: Gumi
text: (Sunã) a cikin itãcen magarya maras ƙaya.

name: Gumi
text: Da wata ayaba mai yawan 'ya'ya.

name: Gumi
text: Da wata inuwa mĩƙaƙƙiya.

name: Gumi
text: Da wani ruwa mai gudãna.

name: Gumi
text: Da wasu 'ya'yan itacen marmari mãsu yawa.

name: Gumi
text: Bã su yankẽwa kuma bã a hana su.

name: Gumi
text: Da wasu shimfiɗu maɗaukaka.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle Mũ, Mun ƙãga halittarsu ƙãgãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan Muka sanya su budurwai.

name: Gumi
text: Mãsu son mazansu, a cikin tsãrã ɗaya.

name: Gumi
text: Ga mazõwa dãma.

name: Gumi
text: Wata ƙungiya ce daga mutãnen farko.

name: Gumi
text: Da wata ƙungiya daga mutãnen ƙarshe.

name: Gumi
text: Mazõwa hagu, Mẽne ne mazõwa hagu?

name: Gumi
text: Sunã a cikin wata iskar zãfi da wani ruwan zãfi.

name: Gumi
text: Da wata inuwa ta hayãƙi mai baƙi.

name: Gumi
text: Bã mai sanyi ba, kuma bã mai wata ni'ima ba.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle sũ, sun kasance a gabãnin wannan waɗanda aka jiyar dãɗi.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma sun kasance sunã dõgẽwa a kan mummũnan zunubi mai girma.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma sun kasance sunã cẽwa: "Shin idan mun mutukuma muko kasance turɓãya da ƙasũsuwa shin lalle mũ waɗanda zã a kõma rãyarwa ne haƙĩƙatan?"

name: Gumi
text: "Shin, kuma da ubanninmu na farko?"

name: Gumi
text: Ka ce: "Lalle mutãnen farko da na ƙarshe."

name: Gumi
text: "Tabbas, waɗanda ake tãrãwa ne a cikin wani yini sananne."

name: Gumi
text: "Sa'an nan lalle ku, ya kũ ɓatattu, mãsu ƙaryatãwa!"

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle mãsu cĩ ne daga wata itãciya ta zaƙƙum (ɗanyen wutã)."

name: Gumi
text: "Har za ku zama mãsu cika cikunna daga gare ta."

name: Gumi
text: "Sa'an nan kuma mãsu shã ne, a kan wannan abin cin, daga ruwan zãfi."

name: Gumi
text: "Ku zama mãsu shã irin shan rãƙuma mãsu ƙishirwa."

name: Gumi
text: Wannan ita ce liyãfarsu a rãnar sakamako.

name: Gumi
text: Mũ ne Muka halitta ku, to, don me bã zã ku gaskata ba?

name: Gumi
text: Shin kuma kun ga abin da kuke fitarwa na maniyyi?

name: Gumi
text: Shin kũ ne kuke halitta shi, kõ kuwa mũ ne Mãsu halittãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Mũ ne Muka ƙaddara mutuwa a tsakãninku, kuma ba Mu zama Mãsu gajiyãwa ba,

name: Gumi
text: A kan Mu musanya waɗansu (mutãne) kamarku, kuma Mu mayar da ku a cikin wata halitta da ba ku sani ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle, ne haƙĩƙa, kun san halittar farko, to, don me ba zã ku yi tunãni ba?

name: Gumi
text: Shin, kuma kun ga abin da kũke nõmãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Shin, kũ ne ke tsirar da shi kõ kuwa Mũ ne Mãsu tsirarwa?

name: Gumi
text: Dã Munã so lalle, da Mun sanya shi bũsasshiyar ciyãwa, sai ku yini kunã mãmãkin bãƙin ciki.

name: Gumi
text: (Kunã cẽwa) "Lalle haƙĩƙa an azã mana tãra!"

name: Gumi
text: "Ã'a, mun dai zama waɗanda aka hanã wa!"

name: Gumi
text: Shin, kuma kun ga ruwa wannan da kuke sha?

name: Gumi
text: Shin, kũ ne kuke saukar da shi daga girgije, kõ kuwa Mũne Mãsu saukarwa?

name: Gumi
text: Dã Mun so, dã Mun mayar da shi ruwan zartsi. To don me bã ku gõdẽwa?

name: Gumi
text: Shin, kuma kun ga wutã wannan da kuke ƙyastãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Shin, kũ ne kuke ƙagã halittar itãciyarta, kõ kuwa Mũ ne Mãsu ƙãgãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Mũ ne Muka sanya ta wata abar wa'azi da jin dãɗi ga matafiya a cikin jẽji.

name: Gumi
text: Sai ka tsarkake sũnan Ubangijinka Mai girma.

name: Gumi
text: To, bã sai Na yi rantsuwa ba da lõkutan fãɗuwar taurãri.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle ne' haƙĩƙa, rantsuwa ce mai girma, dã kun sani.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle shi (wannan littãfi), haƙĩƙa, abin karantãwa ne mai daraja.

name: Gumi
text: A cikin wani littafi tsararre.

name: Gumi
text: Bãbu mai shãfa shi fãce waɗanda aka tsarkake.

name: Gumi
text: Wanda aka saukar ne daga Ubangijin halitta.

name: Gumi
text: Shin, to, wannan lãbãrin ne kuke mãsu wulãkantãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Kuma kunã sanya arzikinku (game da shi) lalle kũ, ku ƙaryata (shi)?

name: Gumi
text: To, don me idan rai ya kai ga maƙõshi? (Kusa da mutuwa).

name: Gumi
text: Alhãli kuwa kũ, a lõklcin nan, kunã kallo.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Mũ ne mafi kusanta gare shi daga gare ku, to, amma kũ bã ku gani.

name: Gumi
text: To, don me in dai kun kasance bã waɗanda zã a yi wa sakamako ba?

name: Gumi
text: Ku mayar da shi (cikin jikinsa) har idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya.

name: Gumi
text: To, amma idan (mai mutuwar) ya kasance daga makusanta,

name: Gumi
text: Sai hũtawa da kyakkyawan abinci da Aljannar ni'ima.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma amma idan ya kasance daga mazõwa dãma,

name: Gumi
text: Sai (a ce masa) aminci ya tabbata a gare ka daga mazõwa dãma.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma amma idan ya kasance daga mãsu ƙaryatãwar, ɓatattun,

name: Gumi
text: Sai wata liyãfa ta ruwan zãfi.

name: Gumi
text: Da ƙõnuwa da Jahĩm,

name: Gumi
text: Lalle wannan, haƙĩƙa, ita ce gaskiya ta yaƙĩni.

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka, ka tsarkake sũnan Ubangijinka, Mai karimci.
